name: Sly Pigs
description:
Once a farmer decided to make an experiment and released all of his pigs into a minefield in order to see if they could collect all the acorns and not lose more than five pig-comrades.

“Sly Pigs” is a puzzle with arcade elements. Wander through the expanses alone or together with your pig-comrades, solve puzzles, collect acorns and be very careful because there are mines everywhere scattered around. The transition to the next level is barred by the trellis and will open only if all acorns are collected.

Game features
  • 2 different locations
  • Old school gameplay
  • Pixel art graphics
  • Unobtrusive music by Hatebit
